title: Amazon SQS trigger to invoke a Lambda function
description: Using an Amazon SQS trigger to invoke a Lambda function

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda function retrieves a batch of SQS messages from the event parameter that it receives. The function logs the content of each message.

codeTabs.title: Usage Example with .NET:
codeTabs.description: Consuming an SQS event with Lambda using .NET.

bullets.text: Using an Amazon SQS trigger to invoke a Lambda function
